title.rendered: Modern 3 Bedroom Duplex on Ally 31, Xuan Dieu, Hanoi

content.rendered: Indulge in urban luxury with our modern 3-bedroom duplex apartment for rent. Enjoy spacious living, including a master suite with a walk-in closet. The highlight? Your exclusive rooftop terrace, making it feel like three levels of luxury living. Experience unparalleled comfort and convenience in a prime location. Schedule a viewing today.
